title: Leeds United Live: Brighton 4-0 Leeds - BBC News
summary: all the action and reaction as leeds united take on brighton in the championship .
hemed penalty gives brighton the lead .
baddock scores second four minutes later .
dunk header makes it four for brighton .

documents.title: good eveningbrighton 4-0 leeds
text: that 's one win in 11 league games for leeds , and tonight 's performance was undoubtedly the worst of the bunch .
we 've been told that no-one from the club will be speaking to the press tonight , which has n't happened since leeds ' 5-1 defeat at luton back in 2006 .
we 'll be back on saturday for leeds ' game against bolton , where you 'd really think it ca n't get any worse .
until then , thank you so much for joining us and enjoy the rest of your evening .

documents.title: noel on brightonbrighton 4-0 leeds
text: brighton look organised , they know their strengths and they know what they are doing .
at times , they embarrassed us .
they have n't spent a fortune either , they just know what they are doing .
they do things with tempo and quality and movement .
they want to win and keep clean sheets .
they play it the right way .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: the season so farbrighton 4-0 leeds
text: as it stands , only charlton have up fewer championship points than leeds in 2016 - and they are currently bottom of the table .
eight wins , 14 draws and 11 losses as it stands for leeds , and 38 points compared to league leaders burnley 's 65 .
it 's just not good enough .

documents.title: noel on steve evansbrighton 4-0 leeds
text: everyone has to take responsibility , from staff to players , because it 's collectively a disgrace what happened on the field .
i do n't know what massimo is going to do and i do n't know if he knows what he 's going to do .
who would want to bet on steve getting sacked ?
realistically i think everyone should sit down and reflect on this evening and find out where to go , because that was unacceptable in any standard of football .
to surrender like that , to show no passion , no pride - it was disgraceful .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: noel on today 's gamebrighton 4-0 leeds
text: it 's a collective responsibility and everyone has to take responsibility for that .
everyone has to ask themselves if they have given enough for this club tonight and the answer is no .
they surrendered halfway through that first half .
i would be getting angry and chasing everything down , no matter what the position , and there was none of that .
that , to me , was an absolute disgrace .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: full time : brighton 4-0 leeds
text: that 's as poor a performance as you could see from a leeds side .
genuinely shambolic at times and they walk off to boos from the 1,000 fans who travelled down .
going four goals down in 20 minutes , liam cooper 's own goal , scott wootton conceding a penalty - it 's been an utterly appalling night at the office for leeds .
get your tweets coming in , leeds fans , @ twitterid

documents.title: brighton 4-0 leeds
text: three minutes of added time ahead , or three minutes for brighton to snatch another goal .
it 's been so easy for them .

documents.title: brighton 2-0 leeds

documents.title: brighton 2-0 leeds

text: leeds have their first real chance as souleymane doukara cuts inside , but his effort is well wide of the far post .

documents.title: breakinggoal baldock : brighton 2-0 leeds
text: if i were sol bamba , or liam cooper , i would n't like to see that one again .
bamba completely gave the ball away in midfield and sam baldock finishes off a well-worked brighton move , via a deflection from liam cooper .
two goals in four minutes , ouch .

documents.title: leeds and goal scoring : not a happy marriagebrighton v leeds
text: brighton are four points off automatic promotion , while leeds have n't reached the top six all season .
goals have not come easily for leeds all season , with the three main strikers netting 17 between them .
chris wood , who will hopefully be fit for the bolton game on saturday , leads the way with 8 , followed by mirco antenucci ( 5 ) and souleymane doukara ( 3 ) .
but past leeds players are prospering elsewhere , to add the ultimate insult to injury .
ross mccormack has netted 18 for fulham , while billy sharp has 15 for sheffield united under his belt .

documents.title: head to headbrighton v leeds
text: brighton are 13 places and 22 points ahead of leeds in the championship , but the promotion hopefuls are n't unbeatable .
they had a wobble in january , losing against rotherham and wolves , but they have bounced back in recent weeks .
tonight 's hosts have lost once in their last five games and have scored 11 goals , conceding just six .
leeds , by contrast , have scored three and conceded three in their last five - and they have n't won since january 23rd .

documents.title: popey on bobby zamorabrighton v leeds
text: bobby zamora is back at brighton this season and the octogenarian striker scored the winner at elland road this season .
my earliest memories of him were in his first spell at the seagulls .
it was a freezing december 2000 afternoon at the withdean and i was covering halifax town for bbc leeds .
the shaymen had taken the lead but zamora grabbed a brace to win the game .
the second was a stunning volley from a narrow angle - very marco van basten .
author: Adam Pope
BBC West Yorkshire Sport

documents.title: last time outbrighton v leeds
text: brighton came out on top when these two sides met at elland road in october .
solly march 's low strike gave brighton the lead after 14 minutes , before liam cooper slid alex mowatt 's free-kick past the keeper to level .
leeds held on well but bobby zamora , on as a substitute and in his first game since rejoining brighton , scored in 89th minute .
zamora 's late winner meant that leeds were winless in their last 11 home games , a new club record - and one that cost uwe rosler his job shortly afterwards .

documents.title: `` i have to deliver my word '' brighton v leeds
text: steve evans has said that as long as he delivers on his word , he believes he will be at leeds united next season .
evans became the club 's sixth head coach in 16 months when he was appointed back in october 2015 .
`` i have to have enough points on the board so we do n't have any insecurity going across the summer months , '' evans told bbc radio leeds .

`` i need to statistically give the chairman that we 're safe in the championship , that there 's no looking over our shoulders and give the opportunity to play a young , vibrant team at times with some of the kids we 've got behind the scenes . ''

documents.title: `` football has forgotten its fans '' brighton v leeds
text: tonight is the fifth time leeds have played at the amex , and guess what ?
none of the games have been on a saturday .
the previous games have been held on two friday nights , two tuesday nights and now a monday night .
a middlesbrough fan came up to me this morning and said tonight is the prime example of how football has forgotten its fans .
author: Adam Pope
BBC West Yorkshire Sport

documents.title: breakingteam newsbrighton v leeds
text: just the two changes for leeds tonight , with liam bridcutt and scott wootton returning to the starting xi .
lewie coyle will start on the right wing , with mirco antenucci and tom adeyemi both dropping to the bench .
brighton xi : stockdale , bruno , dunk , goldson , rosenior , knockaert , stephens , kayal , murphy , hemed , baldock .
leeds xi : silvestri , wootton , cooper , bamba , taylor , coyle , diagouraga , bridcutt , mowatt , cook , doukara .

documents.title: good eveningbrighton v leeds
text: good evening , and welcome to tonight 's live text commentary of brighton v leeds united .
lewis cook 's wonder strike was all anyone could talk about last week as leeds drew against fulham .
however , the whites have just one win from their last ten league games , compared to brighton 's seven-match winning streak .
keep an eye on us here while you enjoy our commentary on 92.4 fm , dab and freeview channel 719 to see if leeds can claim an elusive victory .
